name: Bing Dark Theme
description: This style gives you a full on dark themed experience for bing.com (the official search engine for Windows by Microsoft that comes default on edge).
additional_info:
Release v1.2.2

This is a release version, bugs are **not** to be expected, a GitHub repository will be created shortly where you can report issues, until then please report issues in the comments.

| Updated
+ URLs when searching
+ Search background when selecting text

discussions.name: Date, Language, Region - all missing when this style is active (Stylus in Firefox)
